metadata.title: STRONGER Portable Hand Sanitizer Holder Keychain Travel Size Bottle , 2 Pack 30 ML Leopard Print Pocket Empty Leakproof Plastic Bottle Backbag Decorations For Essential Oil, Shampoo, Liquid
features: 1.【Exquisite and Unique】:Our hand sanitizer holder comes with a leather holder bag to decorate your bottle and protect it from sunlight. Two kinds of leather cases with special patterns, exquisite workmanship and eye-catching, so that you can quickly identify the desired bottle.

2.【Leak-proof and Clean】: The hand sanitizer holder keychain is tightly sealed to prevent liquid leakage. Rigid plastic and leather retention pockets keep bottles safe, and a flip-top design keeps liquids clean.

3.【Fashionable Decoration】: This leopard print keychain is the most practical and special decoration on the bag. Delicate and small, the right size and cute look make the delicate bag more charming, play a decorative role and make your keys easier to find.

4.【Travel Size】:This hand sanitizer case is made of high quality clear plastic, colorless, non-toxic, durable, refillable and reusable. Only 2 oz small plastic travel bottle with leather stand pouch that easily attaches to a backpack, gym bag, lanyard or mobile cart.Our key chain clip set contains 2 pieces of 30ML different styles of empty bottle key ring holders and 2 empty bottles.
5.【Squeezable Design】:Our portable refillable travel squeeze bottle set is suitable for packaging hand sanitizer gel, body wash, hand soap, bath oil, shampoo, body lotion, etc.
description: In daily work and life,it is a good habit to wash hands frequently.When you travel or go out to withdraw money from ATMs,buy fast food, or touch some other dirty things,you should wash your hands in time to avoid infection by germs.At this time,no hand sanitizer is a troublesome problem.It is obviously unrealistic to carry a large bottle of hand sanitizer with you.At this time,you need a mini hand sanitizer bottle.Dispense the hand sanitizer at home and use the matching key chain to hang it on your school bag or belt.It can be squeezed out and cleaned,which is very convenient and will not increase the burden.This will make you envied by others.Give it to children,family,friends,and let this temperature pass to your favorite person.

This bottles can hold about 2 oz liquid.A small bottle of shampoo or laundry detergent can be used 4-5 times for one person. It is very suitable for short trips and daily outings. If you go out for a long time, you can fill a few more bottles. This bottle and bottle cover can be used repeatedly.
This small bottle cover is equipped with a key ring, which can be put together with your key, or can be hung on a backpack and shoulder bag. Take it as you go.

Best Customer Service. If you have any questions,or if you are not satisfied with the hand sanitizer holder, you can contact us at any time,and we will provide you satisfactory service within 24 hours,free of charge.
You can receive the hand sanitizer holder within 3-5 days when you placing an order, because all packages are shipped from the USA.
Color: Multicolor Size: Each product 3.9 * 2.8 * 1.1 inches, 1.3 Ounces Material: Alloy and Leather Style:Stylish and Exquisite
